name: Arena Manager
description:
This was supposed to be a 3-day jam project, but I got too invested and took it to 3-weeks. A good chunk of which was spent screwing around. I won't charge for this POS unless I come back to it later to refine it as an actual project. I will shamelessly ask for donations, though.

Controls?:

Arena Name Button: M1 to set your arena's name

Entry Fee and Jackpot buttons: M1 to set the cost of a contender slot and the theoretical victory jackpot if they were to win

Open@ Button: Set the time you open (hour, default 7, can be no later than 21 (9PM))

Dungeon button: opens up the mob cells and reception counter to buy/sell mobs and contenders. Left-click on the mob cells or reception desk to buy mobs or accept applicants. Right-click a specific mob or contender who is present to get rid of

Schedule button: opens up a TV-Guide-like menu where you set each gate at particular times. Left-Mouse cycles through the type (None, Mob Contender) and right mouse cycles through which specific mob cell or contender is to use that door

Start Day button: Starts the day from the Open@ time (default 7AM). once active, it will stop either automatically at 10PM (22:00) or if you click the button again. Either way will end the day and start over the next day.

Things I wanted to add but I need to move on, so maybe in the future?:
Audience - ticket sales/ arena popularity
More mob variety
Editable timescale
Editable close time
Victory scenarios
Permadeath
Losing/Gameover

The lesson to learn from this project: Try not to let the little things slow you down when you're working on the general infrastructure, but maintain a balance with making sure the foundation is accessible.
